about_the_game:
With Megaquarium's second expansion, the Architect's Collection in your arsenal, you'll be equipped to take your aquarium design skills to new heights!

15 iconic animals

From the gigantic Japanese Spider Crab to the majestic Ocean Sunfish, the Architect's Collection is bursting with aquarium heavyweights. At the other end of the scale, the style-conscious Decorator Crab and notorious Mantis Shrimp are sure to pack a punch!



It will take dedication to collect them all, and you'll have to craft habitats to meet their exacting demands, but these aquatic VIPs will reward you with a display like no other.

Calling all architects!

Build bridges above existing thoroughfares and lay tunnels underneath your tanks! These paradigm-shifting tools will help you realize your creations like never before.




Extend your aquarium skywards with magnificent archways and charming roofs. Themed fences, ropes and glass paneling will take your guests on a journey they'll never forget!

A decorator's dream

With a new selection of paintable facilities, rest assured that meeting your guests' needs won't ruin the aesthetic of your aquarium.


Almost everything in the collection can be painted and with 7 new paints to add to your palette, you'll be spoilt for choice!



While you're on your decorating kick, honor the architects of old with a bumper pack of Greek-themed decorations!

Thinking outside the box!

The Architect's Collection is a celebration of the spaces outside the tanks. With this in mind it comes fully equipped with a new gift shop toy — the adorable Hermit Crab — as well as two customer-focused accessories.

Build it your way

All features within the Architect's Collection integrate seamlessly into the sandbox experience. Furthermore, additional sandbox objectives will become available, specifically designed to take advantage of everything the collection has to offer.

Features

  • 11 tropical and 4 coldwater marine species
  • Bridges, tunnels, archways and roofs
  • Themed walls and dividers
  • Paintable facilities, decorations and new paints
  • Accessories and a new gift shop item
  • Additional objectives to enrich the sandbox experience
detailed_description:
With Megaquarium's second expansion, the Architect's Collection in your arsenal, you'll be equipped to take your aquarium design skills to new heights!

15 iconic animals

From the gigantic Japanese Spider Crab to the majestic Ocean Sunfish, the Architect's Collection is bursting with aquarium heavyweights. At the other end of the scale, the style-conscious Decorator Crab and notorious Mantis Shrimp are sure to pack a punch!



It will take dedication to collect them all, and you'll have to craft habitats to meet their exacting demands, but these aquatic VIPs will reward you with a display like no other.

Calling all architects!

Build bridges above existing thoroughfares and lay tunnels underneath your tanks! These paradigm-shifting tools will help you realize your creations like never before.




Extend your aquarium skywards with magnificent archways and charming roofs. Themed fences, ropes and glass paneling will take your guests on a journey they'll never forget!

A decorator's dream

With a new selection of paintable facilities, rest assured that meeting your guests' needs won't ruin the aesthetic of your aquarium.


Almost everything in the collection can be painted and with 7 new paints to add to your palette, you'll be spoilt for choice!



While you're on your decorating kick, honor the architects of old with a bumper pack of Greek-themed decorations!

Thinking outside the box!

The Architect's Collection is a celebration of the spaces outside the tanks. With this in mind it comes fully equipped with a new gift shop toy — the adorable Hermit Crab — as well as two customer-focused accessories.

Build it your way

All features within the Architect's Collection integrate seamlessly into the sandbox experience. Furthermore, additional sandbox objectives will become available, specifically designed to take advantage of everything the collection has to offer.

Features

  • 11 tropical and 4 coldwater marine species
  • Bridges, tunnels, archways and roofs
  • Themed walls and dividers
  • Paintable facilities, decorations and new paints
  • Accessories and a new gift shop item
  • Additional objectives to enrich the sandbox experience

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64bit operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or AMD Ryzen 7 2700U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7770
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.10 or higher (64bit)
  • Processor: 2x 6-Core Intel Xeon 2.66 GHz (Mac book pro circa 2016)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Megaquarium: Architect's Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or AMD Ryzen 7 2700U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7770
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Architect's Collection adds brand new structural elements such as bridges and tunnels, 15 iconic animals and a plethora of new tools to design and decorate your aquarium with. This ambitious expansion will take your aquarium design skills to new heights!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian, Japanese
